text: Overseas () is an overseas constituency of Italy. It represents Italian people living outside of Italy. ==Members== District Party Senator N. Name Map 01 Europe Democratic Party Andrea Crisanti 02 South America MAIE Mario Borghese 03 North and Central America Democratic Party Francesca La Marca 04 Africa–Asia–Oceania–Antarctica Democratic Party Francesco Giacobbe ==References== Senate
title: Overseas (Senate of the Republic constituency)
